ASAP 0.3.3

Plot Group of Segments

plot_group.Rd

An internal helper function to plot spectrograms for a group of segments.

Usage

plot_group(
  segments,
  base_path,
  n_samples,
  fft_window_size,
  overlap,
  dark_mode,
  legend,
  by_column,
  label,
  cluster = NULL
)

Arguments

segments

A data frame of segment information

base_path

Base directory path for audio files

n_samples

Number of samples to plot

fft_window_size

Size of FFT window

overlap

Overlap between windows

dark_mode

Use dark theme

legend

Show spectrogram legend

by_column

Arrange plots by columns

label

Label for the group of segments

cluster

Optional cluster identifier

Value

Generates a plot of segment spectrograms as a side effect
